title: Design of Pre-Service Teacher Learning Communities Based on Online Science Debates

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science core concepts and foundational comprehension of teacher ethics
context.additional_context: Discussion board utilization to promote interaction among blended learners. Integrates informal science topic discussions and ethics education in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners engage meaningfully (questions/answers/feedback) at least three times in discussion boards related to weekly science topics (e.g., ecosystem changes) over four weeks
Learners understand diverse educational perspectives of peer teachers and generate at least two collaborative problem-solving cases in discussion boards
Through discussion activities, learners identify and share at least three ethical dilemmas in elementary science education settings
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
